nodes.bodyText: ERROR_TYPES is not used in this file. Do you want to add import anyway?
Is this errorHandler necessary? We could call errorsService directly to be consistent. In other components, there is no errorHandler.
I think generalModalService is not in use anymore. Please verify and delete together with import.
